cards.title: Coil
setup: Put Scheming into play, "Evil Mastermind" side up.
Put Acting into play, "Evil Mastermind" side up.

cards.title: Scheming
gameplay: If Scheming's HP is greater than or equal to Acting's HP, use {magic} text.
{magic}: At the start of the villain turn play the top card of the environment deck.
At the end of the villain turn all villain targets regain 2 HP
When this card would be destroyed flip it instead
cards.advanced: At the end of the villain turn set this card's HP to the greater of it's current HP and Acting's HP
cards.flippedGameplay: If Acting is flipped to the "Defeated" side the heroes win the game.
cards.flippedAdvanced: At the end of the villain turn flip this card and set its HP to Acting's HP

cards.title: Acting
gameplay: If Acting's HP is greater than or equal to Scheming's HP, use {magic} text.

At the start of the villain turn reveal cards from the villain deck until you reveal a Parahuman or you've revealed 1 ({magic}: {H - 1}) cards. Put any revealed Parahumans into play and shuffle the other cards into the villain deck.
At the end of the villain turn Acting deals 2 ({magic}: {H}) energy damage to the hero target with the highest HP
When this card would be destroyed flip it instead
cards.advanced: At the end of the villain turn set this card's HP to the greater of it's current HP and Scheming's HP
cards.flippedGameplay: If Scheming is flipped to the "Defeated" side the heroes win the game.
cards.flippedAdvanced: At the end of the villain turn flip this card and set its HP to Scheming's HP

cards.title: Underground Base
cards.body: Villain targets are immune to damage from Environment cards

cards.title: Mercenaries
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn this card deals {H - 1} energy damage to the two hero targets with the highest HP

cards.title: Sundancer
body: This card is immune to fire damage
At the end of the villain turn this card deals 2 fire damage to all hero targets

cards.title: Trickster
body: The first time Trickster would be dealt daamge each round redirect it to the hero target with the lowest HP
At the end of the villain turn the hero with the most cards in play destroys one of their noncharacter cards

cards.title: Genesis
body: When this card is destroyed shuffle it back into the villain deck.
At the end of the villain turn this card deals 2 poison damage to {H} hero targets.

cards.title: Ballistic
body: Whenever a hero character is dealt damage by this card, destroy a noncharacter card belonging to that hero.
At the end of the villain turn this card deals {H + 1} projectile damage to the hero target with the highest HP

cards.title: Dinah
body: Scheming and Acting are immune to damage.
Whenever this card is dealt damage during a hero's turn that player discards a card

cards.title: Circus
body: Whenever a hero card is played this card deals the hero who played the card 1 projectile damage

cards.title: Trainwreck
body: Whenever a non-villain target would damage a villain target other than Trainwreck redirect that damage to Trainwreck.
At the start of the villain turn Trainwreck regains {H} HP.

cards.title: I Know All Your Tricks
body: Destroy all hero Ongoing cards

cards.title: Trickery and Deceit
body: Destroy all hero Equipment cards

cards.title: Let's Try Something Else
body: Shuffle the villain trash into the villain deck.
Play the top card of the villain deck.

cards.title: A Backup For Every Asset
body: Take all Ongoing cards out of the villain trash and put them into play

cards.title: Teleporter
body: At the start of the villain turn reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until you have revealed H non-Device targets. Put any revealed non-Device targets into play and shuffle the rest of the revealed cards back into the villain deck

cards.title: Two Bites At Every Cherry
body: Increase damage dealt by villain targets by 1
Damage dealt by villain targets is irreducible

cards.title: Plans Within Plans
body: Reduce damage dealt to villain targets by 2
